body_text:
Django has no way to create a superuser in a script with a password. createsuperuser can only set a password interactively.
The common alternative is to pipe the Python code to manage.py shell, but I had lots of trouble getting this to work in a container run via docker-compose. I'd love to do this better.
body:
Django has no way to create a superuser in a script _with a password_. `createsuperuser` can only set a password interactively.

The common alternative is to pipe the Python code to `manage.py shell`, but I had lots of trouble getting this to work in a container run via `docker-compose`. I'd love to do this better.
